EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Connectivity Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the connectivity forum. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: Connectivity Forum Date: March 1, 2018 Location: Van Nuys - Western Jet Aviation 16101 Saticoy St, Van Nuys, CA 91406
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
